text: Nino Cerruti (25 September 1930 â€“ 15 January 2022) was an Italian fashion designer. He also started the brand Cerruti. Soon after his father's death he ran a textile mill. He showed his first fashion collection in 1957. He was born in Biella, Italy. Cerruti died from problems caused by hip surgery on 15 January 2022 in Vercelli, Italy at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Italian fashion designers Category:Deaths from surgical complications
title: Nino Cerruti
